name: Fantasy Puzzle Saga
description:
The world, There are the sword, magic and puzzle.
Today, Let's determine a winner!

Fantasy Puzzle Saga is a brand new fighting puzzle game that had never been seen before.
Collect move points in puzzle mode as many as possible, win a battle!

* Feature
Puzzle mode : quick and easy progress
Battle mode : based on 'rock, paper, scissors' rules
Various 10 units
Diverse strategies from various unit stats
Unique 10 skills : various elements
Campaign mode : Over 100 stages
Survival mode : challenge for the highest score
Familiar rules, New and fun game play
Level up system and various items : upgrade your units!
